ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Legends
ygData.msgSnippet: I m afraid I have nothing good to say about Legends. I subscibed, and on the confirmation screen it said I would be billed March 24, 2002. I thought GREAT! A
ygData.messageBody:
I'm afraid I have nothing good to say about Legends. I subscibed, and on the
confirmation screen it said I would be billed March 24, 2002.
I thought GREAT! A free month. So I had my 26 war transfered over and tried
to play. HAHAHA Legends is for people who want to be in a large guild of
'uber' people, cause the stuff that is new and great, you can only go after
if you are high level. I don't care what Verant says. The good stuff is for
high level chars. Period. They revamped Cazic Thule zone, and its all Level
40+ chars..I don't know what else they did. But I wasn't impressed, though I
guess if I was level 60 with a bunch of level 60 friends it might be ok.
THEN....I got a notice from my bank. Now, I only use this account to pay
EverQuest fees (I hate banks) so I only put 10 bucks a month in, plus maybe
10 more to use if I need a soda at the store or something and I don't have
cash on me. The notice said I had been billed 39.95 (USD) for EverQuest on
February 27, 2002. Thank Goodness for overdraft protection...though I get
charged a 22 dollar fee for every transaction that they pay. So, I had
bought a soda, and EverQuest went through first...so I had 2 bounced debits
and 2- $22 fees.....I'm minus about 80 dollars in my account and our only
income is from grants my hubby gets to go to school. I called EQ, they said
sorry, but since the character got transfered over, we can't do anything.

So I filed a formal complaint against Verant Interactive with the Federal
Trade Commission, because they, in effect, stole my money, and caused me big
problems with my bank.

BUT I'm such a damn addict I find myself unable to totally cancel my account
/sigh....I feel like a hypocrit, but what can I do?

Lady Synthea Firestorm
40 Druidess
Sirens of the Storm - Drinal Server


>From: "Richard Skelton" <richards@...>
>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Legends
>Date: Wed, 6 Mar 2002 15:33:01 -0000
>
>Legend is $40 a month. ALL new content in Everquest will go into Legend
>first, and normal servers will suffer because of it, only getting new
>updates as they filter out from Legend. The new content and improvements
>will obviously come through to regular servers slower than in the past, in
>order for Verant to justify the high subscription to Legend and keep those
>few elite and rich players interested.
>
>You might gather I dont subscribe to the Legend server :)
>
>Rykk Bloodfang
>52 Monk
>
